summary: The diff implements REQ-1 fully. The copyright text has been updated in the translation context with the correct format ('© 2025. Z ❤ przez FoxP2' for Polish, '© 2025. With ❤ by FoxP2' for English, '© 2025. Mit ❤ von FoxP2' for German) and is being used in the Footer component via the 'copyrightText' translation key. All acceptance criteria appear to be met.
